articles.author: Lim Hui Jie, Anniek Bao
articles.title: Fed cut sets stage for Asia’s next easing wave amid trade strains - CNBC
articles.description: The Fed's easing may prompt further easing in some Asian countries, particularly those facing greater domestic headwinds.
articles.content: Asian central banks may find more room to ease policy after the Federal Reserve cut interest rates by a quarter percentage point Wednesday and signaled more reductions ahead, as the region contends w… [+4684 chars]
